name: Tap Ball - Brick Break
description:
Tap Ball - Brick Break!!!
Shoot the ball around the room to break all the colored bricks on each level and battle your way to become a block breaker champion. Move the paddle from side to side with your finger and bounce the ball around the screen to break the colored bricks or block.
Features:
- Classic bricks breaker game.
- Intuitive touch controls with realistic bricks break or ping pong physics.
- Simple and addictive gameplay
- Tons of challenging levels to enjoy block breaker game to break block.
